li: Are you looking for your next move?
li.1: Are you well seasoned in Java?
li.2: Do you have a passion for sport?

p.1: If you answered YES to any of these questions, then please read on!
p.3: TDA is partnered with one of the fifth largest sports organisations in the US, with their office based in NYC that is looking for a Mid-Level Software Developer to join. They are looking for an intuitive Full-Stack developer, who is passionate about technology and enjoys working on products that make a difference.
p.5: You will be responsible for the design and development of REST endpoints/back end services consumed by the internet. You will support the production applications as well as business users, and any shared team support duties!

text: At least 3+ years of programming experience in

li.1: Strong technical understanding of web and other multi-tiered, distributed applications.
li.2: At least 2+ years of data modelling and relational database experience.
li.4: Strong analytical skills, including the ability to translate business needs into functional requirements.

p.10: This role is based out of the heart of NYC and will be a hybrid role.

i: If this opportunity appeals to you... Please apply now!
